title: Recap of State of the Union Address, Investing in Energy, PayPal Linking Consumers to Merchants
itunes:title: Recap of State of the Union Address, Investing in Energy, PayPal Linking Consumers to Merchants
description:
Kevin Whitelaw, Bloomberg News U.S. Government Deputy Editor, and Katia Dmitrieva, Bloomberg News U.S. Economy Reporter, share thoughts on the political and economic aspects of President Trump’s State of the Union speech. Toby Loftin, Portfolio Manager of the Hennessy BP Energy and Midstream Funds, explains why he is investing in energy companies like WPX and Energy Transfer. Darrell Esch, VP and Commercial Officer at PayPal Credit, discusses democratizing financial services. Austin Carr, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, talks about his cover story for Businessweek Magazine on Wisconsin's disastrous deal with Foxconn. And we Drive to the Close of markets with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial Group.  

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
